mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM CourseSignUp WHERE studentNumber = #{studentNumber} AND signUp = 1

SELECT c.grade, i.courseClassification, c.classCode, c.classNumber, i.courseName, i.credit, i.theory, i.practice, c.maxPersonnel, c.year, c.semester, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT cs.day,' ', (SELECT ct.time FROM CourseTime ct WHERE ct.id = cs.startTimeId),'-', (SELECT ct.time FROM CourseTime ct WHERE ct.id = cs.endTimeId)) day, c.classroom, c.departmentId, d.name departmentName, d.collegeId, l.name collegeName, l.organizationId, o.name organizationName, c.professorNumber, p.name professorName, p.contact professorContact, p.email professorEmail, p.homepage professorHomepage, p.inserted professorInserted, p.departmentId professorDepartmentId, pd.name professorDepartmentName, pd.collegeId professorCollegeId, pl.name professorCollegeName, pl.organizationId professorOragnizationId, po.name professorOrganizationName, if(s.signUp, 'true', 'false') signUp FROM Course c LEFT JOIN Department d ON c.departmentId = d.id LEFT JOIN College l ON l.id = d.collegeId LEFT JOIN Organization o ON o.id = l.organizationId LEFT JOIN CourseInfo i ON c.classNumber = i.classNumber LEFT JOIN CourseSchedule cs ON c.classCode = cs.classCode LEFT JOIN Professor p ON c.professorNumber = p.professorNumber LEFT JOIN Department pd ON p.departmentId = pd.id LEFT JOIN College pl ON pl.id = pd.collegeId LEFT JOIN Organization po ON po.id = pl.organizationId JOIN CourseSignUp s ON c.classCode = s.classCode WHERE s.studentNumber = #{studentNumber} AND s.signUp = '1' GROUP BY c.classCode ORDER BY c.classCode LIMIT #{startNum}, #{count}

SELECT c.grade, i.courseClassification, c.classCode, c.classNumber, i.courseName, i.credit, i.theory, i.practice, c.maxPersonnel, c.year, c.semester, c.classroom, c.departmentId, d.name departmentName, d.collegeId, l.name collegeName, l.organizationId, o.name organizationName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT cs.day,' ', (SELECT ct.time FROM CourseTime ct WHERE ct.id = cs.startTimeId),'-', (SELECT ct.time FROM CourseTime ct WHERE ct.id = cs.endTimeId)) day, if(ifnull(s.classCode,0), 'true', 'false') desire, if(s.signUp, 'true', 'false') signUp, (SELECT count(*) FROM CourseSignUp u GROUP BY u.classCode HAVING u.classCode = c.classCode) countDesire, (SELECT count(*) FROM CourseSignUp u WHERE u.signUp = 1 GROUP BY u.classCode HAVING u.classCode = c.classCode) countSignUp, c.professorNumber, p.name professorName, p.contact professorContact, p.email professorEmail, p.homepage professorHomepage, p.inserted professorInserted, p.departmentId professorDepartmentId, pd.name professorDepartmentName, pd.collegeId professorCollegeId, pl.name professorCollegeName, pl.organizationId professorOragnizationId, po.name professorOrganizationName FROM Course c LEFT JOIN Department d ON c.departmentId = d.id LEFT JOIN College l ON l.id = d.collegeId LEFT JOIN Organization o ON o.id = l.organizationId LEFT JOIN CourseInfo i ON c.classNumber = i.classNumber LEFT JOIN CourseSchedule cs ON c.classCode = cs.classCode LEFT JOIN Professor p ON c.professorNumber = p.professorNumber LEFT JOIN Department pd ON p.departmentId = pd.id LEFT JOIN College pl ON pl.id = pd.collegeId LEFT JOIN Organization po ON po.id = pl.organizationId JOIN CourseSignUp s ON c.classCode = s.classCode WHERE s.studentNumber = #{studentNumber} GROUP BY c.classCode ORDER BY c.classCode LIMIT #{startNum}, #{count}
